#include <iostream>

#include<cstdio>
#define NUM 1009
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
ll fact[1009],factinv[1009];

ll modularPower(ll base,ll exponent)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(exponent)
    {
        if(exponent& 1)
        res=(res*base)%NUM;
        exponent>>=1;
        base=(base*base)%NUM;

    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    unsigned long long p=1,q=1,N,K,n,s,d,l,r,i,result;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    fact[0]=factinv[0]=1;
    for(i=1;i<=NUM;i++)
        {
            p*=i;
            p=p%NUM;
            fact[i]=p;

            q=q*modularPower(i,1007);
            q=q%NUM;
            factinv[i]=q;
        }
        //s=n+r-l+1;
        //d=n;
        //s=n;
        //d=r;
        while(t--)
        {result=1;
        scanf("%llu%llu",&s,&d);
        while(s)
        {
            N=s%NUM;
            K=d%NUM;
            if(N<K)
            {
            result=0;
            break;
            }
            result*=(fact[N]*factinv[K]*factinv[N-K])%NUM;
            result%=NUM;
            s=s/NUM;
            d=d/NUM;
        }
        //result=(result-1+1000003)%1000003;
        printf("%llu\n",result);
        }
    return 0;
}
